channel.title: Need help on WinterLove
channel.description: [b]Hey guys, how would I go about adding new GlobalObjects to WinterLove V3 - I think, but it has a bank remodel in it, and I'm not quite sure what thats for. But, I've ben trying to expand the Gnome Glider already coded in the server, but I cannot find anywhere to add the Gnome Glider. Its not neccassary to add this, but I would like to, help pl0x;;[/b]

item.title: Need help on WinterLove
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

You CAN add it into the client.java. If you want to add it there, search “ObjectSpawn” and add it in that method. Its better to add it into objectSpawn.java though.

c.makeGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, 187, 0, 10);//Gnome Glider

Replace the xxxx with the X coordinate for your glider, and the yyyy with the Y coordinate.
187 == The object ID for Gnome Glider.
0 = Face. This is the direction in which the object faces.
10 = Object type, The most common are either 0, 5 or 10.

If the object doesn’t show change the object type, compile and restart. Keep doing that until it shows.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on WinterLove
item.dc:creator: @agent_nukks agent nukks
item.description:
@agent_nukks wrote:

Objectspawn.cfg, correct?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2008, 07:35:45 PM[/size][hr]Ohh, I got it, thanks much.
